name: ScooKing
description: A group of Media Informatics and Interactive Entertainment students at the Mittweida University of Applied Sciences assembled (but kept distance) to create a game as part of the beta 2021. Thereby Scoo-King was born. A game, where four players compete in teams of two and engage in an epic food fight taking place in an abstruse monster universe. Ram or throw each other and stuff your dishes into a cannon to demolish the opponent's kitchen. No-holds-barred!
